chat.msg: hola, you ready?
yes!
great! i'm at the starting point and see a twig left to me leading to a small island with a tiger
how do we proceed?
you will keep going until you see a twig in front of you and you should see a parrot on your right, do you see it?
gotcha! i've reached the island and the parrot's right here chilling on a tree, what next mate?
go down and you should see an elephant, but take a left turn when you see a pair of boulders
alright, i see the 3 rocks
i followed them and now i'm standing next to the frog on a new island, what's next, guide?
great! keep going down a little bit until you see a tree with opaque leaves, and then take a right turn until you see the crocodile
haha, that crocodile didn't see me coming! i see the big island with the elephant again, where to now, buddy?
awesome! we keep going straight until we see another pair of bolders and we should have the island with the elepahnt on our right and a giraffe in front of us!
yep, you nailed it! i see the giraffe, and the elephant's chilling on the island to my right
what's our next move, partner?
we're almost there! go down until you see a twig, and if you go straight from there you should see a pink snake
snake spotted! it's giving me the creeps, haha! i suppose the treasure is near? what's next, pal?
perfect! from where the snake is, go straight and the treasure should be right there
wow, i see it! the treasure's gleaming in the distance! just a couple of steps away
*finished* thanks for leading the way, mate!

chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to play?
hola, yes!
awesome! let's start. take a few steps left passing under a wooden bench, and cross the trail to a florist stand, but don't reach it
just hang a u-turn back across the trail. cool?
i reached the florist, do i take the u-turn towards the couple on the bike?
nah buddy, you've gone too far! you gotta make that u turn before hitting the florist stand
head back towards our white dog friend. got it?
sure! i'm with the white dog again and i see some yellow fishes
perfect! but ignore those fishes for now, okay? keep moving south, past the dog, you'll spot another white dog near a cute picnic setup
go that way
ok! i'm with the dog and his picnic now haha
haha excellent! keep up the good work! now, walk on over the mat and touch those yummy looking berries! and keep going to the west
can you handle it?
berries touched!
great! now, look out for that branch; it's time to cross the river again
just go north!
towards the couple or towards the deer?
not toward the deer, friend! but also, not all the way to the couple
you're looking to dodge that bush over there. circle it from the right side and you’ll find the florist stand
great! i'm in front of the florist stand
that's the way! now let's take a left, pass beneath that stand, and you'll see a big bridge with bike-riders
head their way! got it?
here!
nice! keep moving past the bridge, don't stop there yet
you'll soon see a couple of oldies enjoying their newspaper. acknowledge?
i can see them from here :)
haha awesome! move south, between our newspaper buddies and this wooden branch here
keep going until you see a green bush by the branch's end
i see the deer again!
easy there! we're not there yet! stick with the bush and the branch, okay? head east
got it, i can see the bush and the branch
great work! now, just follow the path between the branch and the bush heading to the east
now what?
just keep going east a bit
and there you'll spot a charming brown deer! congrats buddy, you made it! that's our final stop! you nailed it!
awesome! i see the deer :)
yay, you did it! glad you navigated that like a champ
ready for the next round?
yes !
perfect! let's start again from the beginning! remember the white dog? he's waiting for you to start a new adventure!
the white dog with the picnic?
haha hold up! not the picnic one this time
we're going back to our first friend - the white dog at the starting point. ready to kick things off with him again?
ok i'm here next to the bench
perfect! it looks like you're ready for round 2! just like before, head towards the florist stand but don't reach it! you got this!
done! whats next?
amazing! now make a quick u-turn, and start heading back to our white dog pal
you're doing great!
great! whats next?
keep it up! head south, past the white dog
you'll find another white dog near a checkered picnic setup. keep moving in that direction
now what?
great job! now walk over the mat near the picnic setup and touch those berries again
don't eat them though! continue heading west. you're doing fantastic!
berries touched and heading west"
good job! now look for that wooden branch crossing the river
now what?
cross the river using that branch and head north
but watch out for the bush! got it?
got it! now?
awesome! now just go around the right side of the bush to reach the florist stand again
doing good, mate!
in front of the florist now
high five! let's take a left, go below the florist stand, and aim for the bridge with the bikers
great! now what?
keep moving! go past the bridge
you'll see a couple of seniors reading newspapers. got it?
yup! now what?
nice! move south, between our newspaper pals and this wooden branch here
head to the green bush by the branch's end. can you make it?

chat.msg: hey!!! ya comenzamos?
hola! sí :)
genial! veo la tienda al norte
¿hacia dónde vamos?
vamos para el sur hasta que pasemos un perrito y luego veamos un grill
vale, vi al perro y el fuego
¿ahora qué?
ahora hacia el este hasta que pasemos el fuego y veamos unos mushrooms
perfecto, estoy junto al mushroom rojo, ¿y ahora?
una vez más hacia el sur hasta que tengamos a un auto azul al lado azul al
¡genial! ya veo el auto azul al sur, ¿hacia dónde me dirijo ahora?
ahora vamos al oeste y seguimos el trail hacia el sur hasta que llegemos a un telescopio!
ok, estoy junto al telescopio azul al sur, ¿y ahora?
sigue yendo un poquito hacia el sur y antes de que acabe el trail vamos a ir al oeste para encontrar la cabaña, pudiste?
sí! estoy viendo la casa entre las rocas
*terminado* ¡esa fue una gran aventura, gracias!

chat.msg: hi there, empezamos?
sí :)
estupendo! nos encontramos bajo las tres palmas ¿verdad? camina hacia el suroeste, pasando bajo la primera palmera
luego, dale un rápido giro a la derecha, cruza la segunda palmera y vira a la izquierda antes de llegar a la tercera. sigue hacia el sur
veo a un perro y unas rocas grandees, ahora?
justo, eso es genial! ahora gira un poquito a la izquierda del cachorro castaño, y luego gira a la derecha hacia el sur
ahora veo un cangrejo rojo
¡perfecto! seguimos bien el camino
ahora, gira a la derecha (oeste) en dirección al cangrejo rojo y sigue por el costado de la gran roca que está en el agua.
ahora estoy en la playa y veo a un tiburón
genial, estás avanzando bien
haz un giro brusco a la derecha cuando te encuentres frente al tiburón
esquivado! ahora veo un kayak
¡buen trabajo, colega! dirígete a la tierra, cruza entre la roca mediana y la pelota de colores
continúa en dirección norte
great! ahora veo un parlante junto a una carpa
te estás acercando! gira ligeramente a la izquierda y sigue al noroeste, pasando entre la carpa roja y el parlante
ahora tengo a la carpa y el parlante al sur, y ahora?
¡estás haciendo un gran trabajo! ahora, dibuja un arco alrededor de la tienda y luego continúa hacia el sur, pero no llegues al agua
ok, veo al tiburón otra vez
¡genial! entonces, gira a la derecha en la orilla y camina por debajo del kayak rojo
ten cuidado de no mojarte los pies!
listo! veo una piedra grande al frente mío
de acuerdo, deja esa piedra a un lado y gira 90 grados a la derecha, hacia el norte, por el lado de ese kayak

general_survey.answer: Yes! 6 years since I moved, all my roommates had english as their native language.
general_survey.question: Have you ever lived in a home environment or country where your second language was spoken? If so, please explain briefly:
On a day-to-day basis, how likely are you to have a conversation using both your first and second languages?
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At work
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? At home
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with friends
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Interacting with family
How likely would you be to mix languages in the following contexts? Using social media
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? To accommodate people who don't share the same language or language fluency.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? For social reasons; one language feels more appropriate.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I can't think of a word in the current language.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? The word in the other language just fits better.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? It's an accident, or I don't realize I'm doing it.
When you switch languages, how often is it for the following reasons? I'm more comfortable discussing the topic in the other language.
Do you enjoy mixing languages in conversation?

general_survey.answer: I think that it's great and it works for me but it's not like that for a lot of people.
